name: Spring Cleaning (ParkerLeathers, Makritza, jdbrown)
description:
Welcome to Spring Cleaning! This game and all of its assets were made in just 48 hours for the Spring 2D Game Jam! 

The garden is completely covered in pollen! Good thing you're a bee and you love pollen! Make your way through the pollen-infested hedge maze to make it back to your hive. 

Creators:
Parker L - Programming, Level Design, Gameplay Design
Makritza - Art, Game Design
jd brown - Music, SFX, SFX Programming, Game Design

Big thank you to Theo and Zaetu for hosting this jam! We had a lot of fun. Thank you to Unity Technologies as we used Unity to develop the game.
